name: The Adventures of Fatman: Intergalactic Indigestion
name_original: The Adventures of Fatman: Intergalactic Indigestion
description:
The Adventures of Fatman: Intergalactic Indigestion is the follow up to the original Adventures of Fatman by SOCKO! Entertainment.

Tired of being ordinary? Feel an overwhelming desire to save the world? Tired of wearing your underwear inside your pants? Then rejoin our hero Fatman in this classic adventure game, as he attempts to defeat the new threat to mankind - the evil Taberian race!

Play as Fatman as he joins forces with Zarlog the keeper of the ring, to save not just the city of Shadowlawn - but the entire galaxy. Will Fatman be able to overcome the odds and protect the galactic ring? Only your efforts will decide!

Holy hole in a doughnut, Fatman !!


Start a new adventure with the cheese-puff-chomping crime fighter Fatman when an intergalactic invader crash lands in his home city. What happened, why did it crash, and where is the nearest Doughnut World?

Suitable for all ages and first released in 2016 for iOS, this budget point and click adventure by Mike Doak features a new comic-book styled story, original artwork, simple controls and inventory use to help you progress through and cleanse the colonic mystery that awaits you!

Thank you for supporting the developer. Why not play the original "Adventures of Fatman"?
